roleset.name: cause to not exist, be void
roleset.note: NULLIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nullify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No Framenet entry. Nocomparison. (from nullify.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: [DPC, an investor group led by New York-based Crescott Investment Associates,]-1 had itself filed a suit in state court in Los Angeles *trace*-1 seeking *trace*-1 to nullify the agreement.

roleset.name: cause to not exist, not vaild, not in effect
roleset.note: NULL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, nullify.01, annul.01. Corresponds to VNcls void-106. (from null.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: What ... so because i referred to wikipedia somehow my argument is null and void ?
